column1: Composite -- Describes a group of objects that are treated the same way as a single instance of the same type of object.
Strategy -- Enables selecting an algorithm at runtime by providing a corresponding object implementing the algorithm.
Template method -- Allows subclasses to specialize an algorithm by overriding specific methods that represent holes in the algorithm.
Iterator -- Traverse a container and access the container's elements without knowing the internals of the container.
Decorator -- Add behavior to an individual object
column3: without affecting the behavior of other objects from the same class.

column1: Adapter -- Allows the interface of an existing class to be used as another interface.
Facade -- An object that serves as a front-facing interface masking more complex underlying or structural code.
